As for Sona... I would love to try what you are smoking.... Sona is one of the best supports in the game... She has so much to bring to the table (High poke, healing, movement speed, a slow, damage reduction, and a powerful AOE stun...

As for Galio... Against AD assassins, he is a total joke... Against mages... welp, I really feel bad for them... He has a very radically unique kit though... I mean, who else goes to inhib turret and heals himself?
I could tell by your silver border you are a Sona Fan. Your sona icon doesn't help your case. Sona mains, QQing. Play a real support, you'll sky rocket in ranks <3

I gotta agree, i love sona, but she just doesn't do crap compared to all the others. All she has is Q damage, a poopy heal, a poopy aoe speed up, and an aoe stun. Everyone else contributes way more to the team.

Yes, she only has a multiple-target damage Q that buffs her allies damage, a shield on top of her heal that scales with both AP and the target's missing health and also reduces enemies' damage, a speed buff for herself and all allies within the AoE that can also slow enemies, and an AoE stun that also passively buffs all her other abilities.

So little to offer. Its like... you have to actually press buttons and know where to stand and other things. Maybe warding.

tell me what sona can do vs Soraka team and I will tell you what blitz/thresh/naut/braum or any good support can. While sona will sit there and let sora heal their team all day, other supports will actually ef everyone up.
Now that Rakan exists she can get dumpstered really easily

Then they get verbally assaulted by Rito-worshiping sheep like him who are brainwashed into hating Sona and demand she remain the weakest character in the game, whilst falsely claiming otherwise.

I'm fairly certain he realizes that already, which is where your point falls flat.  Sona is at least amongst the 5 weakest characters in the game.  Thus claiming otherwise is QQing, approval of Rito making her unplayable and complacent of the fact that picking her is synonymous to assisting the enemy.  Which is all akin to Sona-hating.

http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v636/pika310/Sona%20Buvelle%20RIP%207_zpswmc06ifb.jpg

Galio is not that weak right now. He has a huge aoe taunt that does massive dmg as well as a large amount of poke, decent mobility, and very high sustain. The only thing thats bad for him now is that it's not an ap meta.
{{champion:53}} Press E, get taunted, stop the taunt's channel. GG
{{champion:201}} Get taunted, proc passive, all the team cooperates to break passive (taunt OP), Galio ult ends.
{{champion:37}}
Really? She had a decent pick and winrate right now.

Don't put so much stock solely into winrate alone, hers is completely artificial.  It comes from leaning her full weight on Spellblade as a crutch.  Without that or Echo, her real winrate is legitimately less than 40%
So then you want her to be really strong without those items? Then Sona becomes an overpowered monster when she gets them

I want an actual rework instead of whatever we have now.

What we have now is a "we want to stop Sona from being a passive poke support" passive poke support.

Ironically, Sona has NEVER been a "passive" support.  This was just a bullshit excuse that Fearless fabricated to justify his misactions.

He himself self-proclaims to be a jungle main, had never played Sona before volunteering himself for the project, almost never played with or against a Sona in-game(and even then, he was in the jungle and never bot with/against her) and openly admitted he was blatantly unqualified to change her.  He also happens to be ranked gold, yet blatantly ignored advice from expert Sona players in diamond+.

However, he was a brand new employee to the company and Rito has a policy that they give equal opportunity to all employees and volunteers, namely an intern is given the exact same unsupervised power to change game balance as they see fit, as is given veteran employees like Ezreal or Guinsoo.  Fearless saw this as a double opportunity to not only intentionally ruin a character he has a clear hatred towards, but also start getting undeserved promotions by falsely self-proclaiming his own work a "success" and choosing to not only ignore community outrage, but also personally hit her with even MORE nerfs after to make it misleadingly appear to the upper staff that he was doing a good job.  In other words, Fearless committed fraud.
